title: Heap Sort
subject: Data Structures
theory:
1. Build Max Heap from array. O(n).
2. Swap Root (Max) with last item. Reduce size.
3. Heapify Root. O(log n).
4. Repeat.
Total: O(n log n).

interview_questions.question: Is Heap Sort stable?
interview_questions.answer: No. Swapping elements disrupts relative order.

real_world_use_cases.description: Used when O(1) space is required and worst-case O(n log n) must be guaranteed (unlike Quick Sort).
